newsitem.title: USA: Virginia Electric & Power Co issues debt.
newsitem.headline: Virginia Electric & Power Co issues debt.

text.p: The following issue from Virgina Electric & Power Co (VEPCO) was priced via competitive
bid on Thursday, according to lead underwriter JP Morgan
TYPE 1ST MTGE BONDS ISS PRICE 98.736 FIRST PAY DATE 08/01/97 LAST MOODY'S A2 YIELD 6.929 PAY FREQ SEMI
LAST S&P A SPREAD +60 BPS CALLABLE FIVE
